name: The Factory (itch) (Undone Flame)
description:
made for the brackeys game jam 2022.1 and also my first jam game

a tiny platformer where YOU(the I'm Not Not Real or I.N.N.R.) decide what isn't real. this game also has a large emphasis on boxes.

promotional art is made by my anonymous friend

everything else is made by me

3-6 minutes
